pages.source: The $(item)Alchemy Table$() crafts items using $(blood)LP$() from a $(l:bloodmagic:altar/soul_network)Soul Network$(/l). The $(thing)Soul Network$() used and Tier of recipes available are determined by the $(item)Blood Orb$() inserted on the right side of the GUI. $(br2)The $(item)Alchemy Table$() is used to craft a handful of $(6)Blood Magic$() components, and provides alternate recipes for some vanilla items as well.
pages.translation: The $(item)錬金術テーブル$() crafts items using $(blood)LP$() from a $(l:bloodmagic:altar/soul_network)ソウルネットワーク$(/l). The $(thing)ソウルネットワーク$() used and ティア of recipes available are determined by the $(item)血のオーブ$() inserted on the right side of the GUI. $(br2)The $(item)錬金術テーブル$() is used to craft a handful of $(6)Blood Magic$() components, and provides alternate recipes for some vanilla items as well.

pages.source: When looking at $(item)Alchemy Table$() recipes in this book (or in $(thing)JEI$()), please hover over the arrow with an "LP" label to view Time, $(blood)LP$() drain, and Tier information.
pages.translation: When looking at $(item)錬金術テーブル$() recipes in this book (or in $(thing)JEI$()), please hover over the arrow with an "LP" label to view Time, $(blood)LP$() drain, and ティア information.

pages.source: The Alchemy Table can be inserted into or extracted from using these buttons.
pages.translation: The 錬金術テーブル can be inserted into or extracted from using these buttons.

pages.source: The $(item)Alchemy Table$() has a number of buttons on its right hand side. These are, in order, $(bold)D$()own, $(bold)U$()p, $(bold)N$()orth, $(bold)S$()outh, $(bold)W$()est, and $(bold)E$()ast. To use them, first click on any slot in the Alchemy Table. (Here, we have selected the central 'finished item' slot, for demonstration.) Next, click on one of these six buttons to toggle whether or not the $(item)Alchemy Table$() should allow $(item)Hoppers$(), pipes, or other such external interference from this face. To return to the table's normal function,
pages.translation: The $(item)錬金術テーブル$() has a number of buttons on its right hand side. These are, in order, $(bold)D$()own, $(bold)U$()p, $(bold)N$()orth, $(bold)S$()outh, $(bold)W$()est, and $(bold)E$()ast. To use them, first click on any slot in the 錬金術テーブル. (Here, we have selected the central 'finished item' slot, for demonstration.) Next, click on one of these six buttons to toggle whether or not the $(item)錬金術テーブル$() should allow $(item)ホッパー$(), pipes, or other such external interference from this face. To return to the table's normal function,

pages.source: simply click the slot again to deselect it. The icon displayed in the slot shows whether it is accepting inputs or providing outputs. In the example picture, we are allowing pipes to take from our central slot only on the $(bold)D$()own slot, and any attempts to extract items from other sides will not succeed.
pages.translation: simply click the slot again to deselect it. The icon displayed in the slot shows whether it is accepting inputs or providing outputs. In the example picture, we are allowing pipes to take from our central slot only on the $(bold)D$()own slot, and any attempts to extract items from other sides will not succeed.

pages.source: The Alchemy Table will tell you when something is wrong.
pages.translation: The 錬金術テーブル will tell you when something is wrong.

pages.source: The two most common reasons for a recipe to not work in the Alchemy Table are as follows: $(li)$(bold)Orb Error$(): Either there is no Blood Orb present in the relevant slot, or the Orb you are trying to use is not a high enough level for this recipe. $(li)$(bold)Soul Network Error$(): The orb is of a valid level, but either you have not bound it to yourself (right click while holding it), or your Soul Network does not have enough LP in it. $(br2)The following pages document a number of recipes currently available for the Alchemy Table,
pages.translation: The two most common reasons for a recipe to not work in the 錬金術テーブル are as follows: $(li)$(bold)Orb Error$(): Either there is no 血のオーブ present in the relevant slot, or the Orb you are trying to use is not a high enough level for this recipe. $(li)$(bold)ソウルネットワーク Error$(): The orb is of a valid level, but either you have not bound it to yourself (right click while holding it), or your ソウルネットワーク does not have enough LP in it. $(br2)The following pages document a number of recipes currently available for the 錬金術テーブル,

pages.source: The $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/lava)Lava$() and $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/water)Water Sigils$() are not consumed in either of these recipes. What's more, the $(item)Water Sigil$() can be used in place of a $(water)Water Bucket$() in any Alchemy Table Recipe.
pages.translation: The $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/lava)Lava$() and $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/water)水のシジルs$() are not consumed in either of these recipes. What's more, the $(item)水のシジル$() can be used in place of a $(water)水入りバケツ$() in any 錬金術テーブル Recipe.

pages.source: $(item)Anointments$() are essentially $(item)potions$() for your tools, weapons, and even your $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demonic_items/explosive_charges)Charges$(). By Pressing [$(k:use)] with the $(item)anointment$() in one hand, it will be applied to the item in your other hand, if possible. Not all anointments work on all equipment! $(br2)Unlike $(item)potions$(), $(item)anointments$() aren't timed; rather, they wear off a bit at a time as your tool or weapon is used.
pages.translation: $(item)膏薬$() are essentially $(item)potions$() for your tools, weapons, and even your $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demonic_items/explosive_charges)Charges$(). By Pressing [$(k:use)] with the $(item)anointment$() in one hand, it will be applied to the item in your other hand, if possible. Not all anointments work on all equipment! $(br2)Unlike $(item)potions$(), $(item)anointments$() aren't timed; rather, they wear off a bit at a time as your tool or weapon is used.

pages.source: A sturdy Vial that can contain otherwise uncontainable mixtures.
pages.translation: A sturdy Vial that can contain otherwise uncontainable mixtures.

pages.source: The basics of $(thing)Potion Crafting$() are known to all and sundry throughout the land. Even common Clerics and Witches have a firm grasp of the basics of brewing - take a handful of semi-rare ingredients, mix them together in the correct proportions, and consume the result (while holding your nose, if needed).
pages.translation: The basics of $(thing)ポーション Crafting$() are known to all and sundry throughout the land. Even common Clerics and Witches have a firm grasp of the basics of brewing - take a handful of semi-rare ingredients, mix them together in the correct proportions, and consume the result (while holding your nose, if needed).

pages.source: The addition of $(blood)Life Essence$() and some frankly ingenious Sanguimancy has allowed you to turbocharge the practice, however. $(br2)By imbuing ordinary $(item)Glass Bottles$() with your powers, you are able to hold far more than a single swig of liquid, and with the use of various $(item)Catalysts$() you have figured out how to combine multiple effects in one flask without them muddying together and cancelling out.
pages.translation: The addition of $(blood)生命のエッセンス$() and some frankly ingenious Sanguimancy has allowed you to turbocharge the practice, however. $(br2)By imbuing ordinary $(item)ガラス瓶s$() with your powers, you are able to hold far more than a single swig of liquid, and with the use of various $(item)触媒$() you have figured out how to combine multiple effects in one flask without them muddying together and cancelling out.

pages.source: A sturdy Flask that is far more capacious than any measly bottle!
pages.translation: A sturdy Flask that is far more capacious than any measly bottle!

pages.source: Of course, a bottle, no matter how advanced, is all but useless without something to fill it. $(br2)Alongside all the usual well known $(thing)Effects$() such as $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/water_breathing)Water Breathing$(), $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/regeneration)Regeneration$(), or $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/night_vision)Night Vision$(), we have also perfected a variety of other, more specialised recipes, such as $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/flight)Flight$(), $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/obsidian_cloak)Obsidian Cloak$(), or even $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/passive)Passive$(). These potions and many more are documented further on in the book.
pages.translation: Of course, a bottle, no matter how advanced, is all but useless without something to fill it. $(br2)Alongside all the usual well known $(thing)効果$() such as $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/water_breathing)水中呼吸$(), $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/regeneration)再生$(), or $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/night_vision)暗視$(), we have also perfected a variety of other, more specialised recipes, such as $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/flight)飛行$(), $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/obsidian_cloak)黒曜石の外套$(), or even $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/passive)平和$(). These potions and many more are documented further on in the book.

pages.source: Once you have used up any kind of $(item)alchemy flask$(), simply wash out and refill it with $(water)water$(), to get a fresh new flask ready for use. $(br2)Flasks also have their equivalent to $(thing)Splash$() and $(thing)Lingering Potions$().
pages.translation: Once you have used up any kind of $(item)alchemy flask$(), simply wash out and refill it with $(water)water$(), to get a fresh new flask ready for use. $(br2)Flasks also have their equivalent to $(thing)スプラッシュ$() and $(thing)残留 ポーション$().

a_heading.translation: スプラッシュ 錬金術フラスク

b_heading.translation: 残留 錬金術フラスク

pages.source: You may recall me mentioning the ability to make multiple $(thing)effects$() in a single $(item)Flask$(). Luckily, this process couldn't be easier. Simply brew up a potion, and use the resulting Flask in place of your empty Flask in the second brewing. For example, if you made a Flask of $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/bounce)Bounce$(), then took that flask and used it as an ingredient in a flask of $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/night_vision)Night Vision$(), you'd end up with an 8-dose Flask that gives you $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/bounce)Bounce$() and $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/night_vision)Night Vision$() with every swig!
pages.translation: You may recall me mentioning the ability to make multiple $(thing)effects$() in a single $(item)Flask$(). Luckily, this process couldn't be easier. Simply brew up a potion, and use the resulting Flask in place of your empty Flask in the second brewing. For example, if you made a Flask of $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/bounce)跳ね返り$(), then took that flask and used it as an ingredient in a flask of $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/night_vision)暗視$(), you'd end up with an 8-dose Flask that gives you $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/bounce)跳ね返り$() and $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/night_vision)暗視$() with every swig!

pages.source: Next up, we have $(item)Catalysts$(). There are a few kinds of catalyst, with a few different effects, so let's start off with the simplest three - $(item)Simple Catalyst$(), $(item)Small Power Catalyst$(), and $(item)Small Lengthening Catalyst$(). Of these, the first is the most straightforward - it provides a base to almost every Alchemical Potion, much as $(item)Nether Wart$() does for standard Potions.
pages.translation: Next up, we have $(item)触媒$(). There are a few kinds of catalyst, with a few different effects, so let's start off with the simplest three - $(item)シンプル触媒$(), $(item)Small 強化触媒$(), and $(item)Small 延長触媒$(). Of these, the first is the most straightforward - it provides a base to almost every Alchemical ポーション, much as $(item)ネザーウォート$() does for standard ポーション.

pages.source: A good base for nearly any effect. Stock up, you'll want a lot of these.
pages.translation: A good base for nearly any effect. Stock up, you'll want a lot of these.

pages.source: $(item)Power Catalysts$() increase the potency of the topmost $(thing)effect$() inside the $(item)Flask$(), while decreasing the duration of the effect. It is roughly analogous to $(item)Glowstone$() in more standard potions. If the most recently applied effect cannot accept the catalyst, it will attempt to boost the second topmost, and so on.
pages.translation: $(item)強化触媒s$() increase the potency of the topmost $(thing)effect$() inside the $(item)Flask$(), while decreasing the duration of the effect. It is roughly analogous to $(item)グロウストーン$() in more standard potions. If the most recently applied effect cannot accept the catalyst, it will attempt to boost the second topmost, and so on.

pages.source: $(item)Lengthening Catalysts$() increase the duration of the topmost $(thing)effect$() inside the $(item)Flask$(). It is roughly analogous to $(item)Redstone$() in more standard potions. If the most recently applied effect cannot accept the catalyst, it will attempt to boost the second topmost, and so on.
pages.translation: $(item)延長触媒s$() increase the duration of the topmost $(thing)effect$() inside the $(item)Flask$(). It is roughly analogous to $(item)レッドストーン$() in more standard potions. If the most recently applied effect cannot accept the catalyst, it will attempt to boost the second topmost, and so on.

pages.source: $(item)Combinational Catalysts$() are a little more niche - they take two defined effects and synthesise a third, related effect from them. For example, a Flask with $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/suspended)Suspended$() and $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/levitation)Levitation$() would, when brewed with this catalyst, produce a Flask of $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/flight)Flight$().
pages.translation: $(item)組み合わせ触媒s$() are a little more niche - they take two defined effects and synthesise a third, related effect from them. For example, a Flask with $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/suspended)浮遊状態$() and $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/vanilla/levitation)浮遊$() would, when brewed with this catalyst, produce a Flask of $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_table/potion_flasks/blood_magic/flight)飛行$().

pages.source: $(item)Filling Agents$() can be used to refresh the contents of a Flask, at the cost of losing some of the effects - the Weak Filling Agent can only preserve the topmost effect on the Flask. If you wish to preserve a different effect, consider using the $(item)Simple Cycling Catalyst.$()
pages.translation: $(item)充填剤s$() can be used to refresh the contents of a Flask, at the cost of losing some of the effects - the Weak 充填剤 can only preserve the topmost effect on the Flask. If you wish to preserve a different effect, consider using the $(item)Simple サイクル触媒.$()

pages.source: The $(item)Cycling Catalyst$() can be used to alter the order of effects inside the Flask, and thus change which effect will be altered by another Catalyst or Agent.
pages.translation: The $(item)サイクル触媒$() can be used to alter the order of effects inside the Flask, and thus change which effect will be altered by another 触媒 or Agent.

pages.source: Increases the damage of fired arrows by 25%. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (256 shots)
pages.translation: Increases the damage of fired arrows by 25%. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (256 shots)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (1024 shots)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (1024 shots)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the damage by 50% instead. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot II (256 shots)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the damage by 50% instead. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot II (256 shots)

pages.source: Increases the velocity of fired arrows by 50%. This also increases the damage dealt by your arrows proportionally. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Sniping I (256 shots)
pages.translation: Increases the velocity of fired arrows by 50%. This also increases the damage dealt by your arrows proportionally. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Sniping I (256 shots)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Sniping I (1024 shots)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Sniping I (1024 shots)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the velocity by 100% instead. $(br2)Applies: Sniping II (256 shots)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the velocity by 100% instead. $(br2)Applies: Sniping II (256 shots)

name.translation: フォルトゥーナエキス

pages.source: Increases the yield of some harvested blocks. Also stacks with the Fortune enchantment. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (256 blocks)
pages.translation: Increases the yield of some harvested blocks. Also stacks with the Fortune enchantment. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (256 blocks)

heading.translation: フォルトゥーナエキス

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (1024 blocks)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (1024 blocks)

heading.translation: フォルトゥーナエキス L

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate II (256 blocks)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate II (256 blocks)

heading.translation: フォルトゥーナエキス II

pages.source: Blocks drop exp on successful harvest. Drops +2exp per block. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (256 blocks)
pages.translation: Blocks drop exp on successful harvest. Drops +2exp per block. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (256 blocks)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (1024 blocks)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (1024 blocks)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets II (256 blocks)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets II (256 blocks)

pages.source: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +5. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (256 hits)
pages.translation: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +5. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (256 hits)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (1024 hits)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (1024 hits)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment increases melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +10. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light II (256 hits)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment increases melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +10. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light II (256 hits)

pages.source: Increases the drops from killed mobs. Also stacks with the Looting enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Plundering I (256 hits)
pages.translation: Increases the drops from killed mobs. Also stacks with the ドロップ増加 enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Plundering I (256 hits)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Plundering I (1024 hits)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Plundering I (1024 hits)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment further increases the drops from killed mobs. $(br2)Applies: Plundering II (256 hits)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment further increases the drops from killed mobs. $(br2)Applies: Plundering II (256 hits)

pages.source: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt by +3. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Whetstone I (256 hits)
pages.translation: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt by +3. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Whetstone I (256 hits)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Whetstone I (1024 hits)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Whetstone I (1024 hits)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment increases melee damage dealt by +6. $(br2)Applies: Whetstone II (256 hits)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment increases melee damage dealt by +6. $(br2)Applies: Whetstone II (256 hits)

pages.source: Lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 33%. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (256 shots)
pages.translation: Lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 33%. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (256 shots)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (1024 shots)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (1024 shots)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 50%. $(br2)Applies: Deft Hands II (256 shots)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 50%. $(br2)Applies: Deft Hands II (256 shots)

pages.source: Applies Silk Touch to blocks harvested. Does not stack with the vanilla enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Soft Touch I (256 blocks)
pages.translation: Applies シルクタッチ to blocks harvested. Does not stack with the vanilla enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Soft Touch I (256 blocks)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Soft Touch I (1024 blocks)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Soft Touch I (1024 blocks)

pages.source: Uses heat to smelt harvested blocks. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (256 blocks)
pages.translation: Uses heat to smelt harvested blocks. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (256 blocks)

pages.source: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (1024 blocks)
pages.translation: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (1024 blocks)

pages.source: If the target would take fall damage, $(thing)Bounce$() will instead cause them to spring harmlessly off the ground. Whee! $(br2)Crouching before impact will prevent you from bouncing.
pages.translation: If the target would take fall damage, $(thing)跳ね返り$() will instead cause them to spring harmlessly off the ground. Whee! $(br2)Crouching before impact will prevent you from bouncing.

pages.source: $(thing)Flight$() gives the target a temporary dose of creative-style Flight, similar to if they were within the range of the $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_list/ritual_condor)Reverence of the Condor$() ritual. Higher levels increase flight speed.
pages.translation: $(thing)飛行$() gives the target a temporary dose of creative-style 飛行, similar to if they were within the range of the $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_list/ritual_condor)Reverence of the Condor$() ritual. Higher levels increase flight speed.

pages.source: $(thing)Gravity$() cause the target to fall faster and take more damage on landing. It does not reduce jump height, however.
pages.translation: $(thing)重力$() cause the target to fall faster and take more damage on landing. It does not reduce jump height, however.

pages.source: $(thing)Grounded$() prevents the target from jumping. Swimming is unaffected, however.
pages.translation: $(thing)接地$() prevents the target from jumping. Swimming is unaffected, however.

pages.source: $(thing)Hard Cloak$() provides 3 points of Armour Toughness per level when used.
pages.translation: $(thing)硬化の外套$() provides 3 points of Armour Toughness per level when used.

pages.source: $(thing)Heavy Heart$() drags the target steadily downwards, making flying and swimming significantly more difficult.
pages.translation: $(thing)重い心臓$() drags the target steadily downwards, making flying and swimming significantly more difficult.

pages.source: $(thing)Obsidian Cloak$() reduces all damage taken from non-magical sources by 20% per level.
pages.translation: $(thing)黒曜石の外套$() reduces all damage taken from non-magical sources by 20% per level.

pages.source: $(thing)Passive$() prevents the affected target from attacking. Players are unaffected, however.
pages.translation: $(thing)平和$() prevents the affected target from attacking. Players are unaffected, however.

pages.source: $(thing)Suspended$() prevents the target from jumping, falling, or being affected by gravity in any way whatsoever. They can still move, however, sliding about as though on a flat, never-ending plane of ice.
pages.translation: $(thing)浮遊状態$() prevents the target from jumping, falling, or being affected by gravity in any way whatsoever. They can still move, however, sliding about as though on a flat, never-ending plane of ice.

pages.source: $(thing)Fire Resistance$() makes the target immune to most fire-based damage.
pages.translation: $(thing)火炎耐性$() makes the target immune to most fire-based damage.

pages.source: $(thing)Instant Damage$() inflicts 6 points of $(thing)Magic Damage$() to the target per level. If the target is $(thing)Undead$(), they will be healed for 6 points per level instead.
pages.translation: $(thing)即時ダメージ$() inflicts 6 points of $(thing)Magic Damage$() to the target per level. If the target is $(thing)Undead$(), they will be healed for 6 points per level instead.

pages.source: $(thing)Instant Health$() heals the target for 4 points per level. If the target is $(thing)Undead$(), they will be harmed for 4 points per level instead.
pages.translation: $(thing)即時回復$() heals the target for 4 points per level. If the target is $(thing)Undead$(), they will be harmed for 4 points per level instead.

pages.source: $(thing)Invisibility$() causes the target to disappear from view, making it harder for them to be spotted. This effect does not extend to any $(item)Armour$() or held items, any of which may be a give-away as to the target's location.
pages.translation: $(thing)透明化$() causes the target to disappear from view, making it harder for them to be spotted. This effect does not extend to any $(item)Armour$() or held items, any of which may be a give-away as to the target's location.

pages.source: $(thing)Jump Boost$() increases the target's jump height by 50% per level. It also reduces fall damage by 1 point per level.
pages.translation: $(thing)跳躍力上昇$() increases the target's jump height by 50% per level. It also reduces fall damage by 1 point per level.

pages.source: $(thing)Levitation$() causes the target to float up into the air.
pages.translation: $(thing)浮遊$() causes the target to float up into the air.

pages.source: $(thing)Night Vision$() increases the target's ability to see in darkness and underwater.
pages.translation: $(thing)暗視$() increases the target's ability to see in darkness and underwater.

pages.source: $(thing)Poison$() deals damage over time to the target, but cannot kill them on its own. Higher levels deal faster damage.
pages.translation: $(thing)毒$() deals damage over time to the target, but cannot kill them on its own. Higher levels deal faster damage.

pages.source: $(thing)Regeneration$() heals the target over time. Higher levels increase the rate of healing.
pages.translation: $(thing)再生$() heals the target over time. Higher levels increase the rate of healing.

pages.source: $(thing)Slow Falling$() causes the target to fall slowly and take no fall damage, akin to a $(thing)chicken$().
pages.translation: $(thing)低速落下$() causes the target to fall slowly and take no fall damage, akin to a $(thing)chicken$().

pages.source: $(thing)Slowness$() decreases the target's movement speed by 15% per level. $(br2)See overleaf for Catalyst Combinations
pages.translation: $(thing)鈍化$() decreases the target's movement speed by 15% per level. $(br2)See overleaf for 触媒 Combinations

a_heading.translation: 鈍化 from 移動速度上昇

b_heading.translation: 鈍化 from 跳躍力上昇

pages.source: $(thing)Speed$() increases the target's movement speed by 20% per level.
pages.translation: $(thing)移動速度上昇$() increases the target's movement speed by 20% per level.

pages.source: $(thing)Strength$() increases the target's attack damage by 3 points per level.
pages.translation: $(thing)攻撃力上昇$() increases the target's attack damage by 3 points per level.

pages.source: $(thing)Water Breathing$() allows the target to breathe underwater.
pages.translation: $(thing)水中呼吸$() allows the target to breathe underwater.

pages.source: $(thing)Weakness$() decreases the target's attack damage by 4 points per level.
pages.translation: $(thing)弱体化$() decreases the target's attack damage by 4 points per level.
